Welcome!

Alg-E is an interactive platform to create data-driven algorithms combining clinical oversight with machine learning techniques. You can upload your data in the platform and run your own models and share insights through a simple url.
Alg-E is developed by a research group based in the Machine Learning and Optimization Laboratory at EPFL.


The source code is available here.

Haven't you found what you were looking for? Contact us here.
